name: The 20 Seconds Gundown
description:
There is a duel at sunset!

A bunch of people are standing in the plaza. When the sun sets, shoot two guys. If you land on the bad ones you win. 

But don't move until then! 

How do bad people behave you ask? Here is a detailed guide for you. You can also apply it to your daily life

Pay attention, observe your surroundings, and wait for the right time to draw your gun.

Made for the 20 seconds GameJam 

For more info about the music used in this game
